features.title: Built for how business actually happens

regionalFit.title: Built for the reality of the GCC.
regionalFit.gccNative: GCC-native operations (timezone, weekend modes, regional workflows)
regionalFit.ai: AI that monitors deals, silence, and momentum

crm.title: Your CRM is lying to you.
crm.p1: WhatsApp messages are ignored. Follow-ups are missed. Deals die in silence.
crm.p2: Traditional CRMs are databases that rely on manual entry. They don't see conversations.
crm.p3: They don't see silence. They don't see risk.

bottomCta.title: Built for serious operators.
bottomCta.description: If you're done managing chaos and ready to run a real system, talk to Astrah.

SystemModules.sectionSubtitle: One operating layer. Each module produces signals you can act on.

whatsapp.title: WhatsApp Intelligence
whatsapp.description: Turns WhatsApp threads into structured CRM activity (summaries, signals, follow-ups)

dealHealth.title: Deal Health
dealHealth.description: Detects risk early (silence + stagnation) and recommends the next best action.

inboxZero.title: AI Inbox Zero
inboxZero.description: Unified view that triages conversations and produces next steps.

priorityQueue.title: AI Priority Queue
priorityQueue.description: Ranks what to do now across deals and chats so nothing slips.

leadGen.title: AI Lead Generator
leadGen.description: Finds and ranks target companies worldwide using region-tuned signals and enrichment.

askAstrah.title: Ask Astrah (Orb AI Assistant)
askAstrah.description: Answers across CRM + WhatsApp + docs, with optional general knowledge mode.
askAstrah.placeholder: Ask anything about your pipeline, deals, or next steps...

smartClose.title: Smart Close
smartClose.description: Quote/Offer + embedded e-sign (BoldSign) + Tap payment (where available)

demand.title: Demand, built in.
demand.desc: Astrah doesn't just manage leads. It helps generate pipeline inside your system.
demand.list1: Discover and rank target companies worldwide

revenue.title: Stop revenue leaks.
revenue.desc: Astrah detects risk before it becomes loss.
revenue.list3: Priority queue for follow-ups → “Next actions ranked”
revenue.footer: No auto-sending. No surprise actions. You stay in control.

inbox.title: Inbox intelligence.
inbox.desc: One unified view. Thread summaries. Priority signals. Clear next steps.

cash.title: From agreement to cash.
cash.desc: Close the admin gap. Go from “yalla” to paid.

alive.title: The system is alive.
alive.desc1: Persistent intelligence layer that surfaces signals, risks, and next actions.
alive.desc2: Not a chatbot toy. Not random guesses. Supports decisions. You decide.

migration.title: Go live in days, not weeks.
migration.desc-1: Most standard migrations go live in ~72 hours.

hero.title: A system built for the Gulf.
hero.description: Astrah OS is a WhatsApp-first, AI-native Business Operating System designed for GCC teams. Not a CRM. A system.
hero.secondaryTitle: Business in the GCC runs on conversations.
hero.p1: Most CRMs were built for email-first markets and manual data entry. But in the Gulf, revenue happens inside WhatsApp threads, voice notes, fast decisions, and follow-ups that can't be missed.
hero.p2: That's why traditional CRMs feel disconnected from reality: they store records, but they don't detect silence, they don't surface risk, and they don't protect pipeline momentum.
hero.p3: Astrah OS exists to make revenue execution feel controlled.

principles.mainTitle: Not a tool. An operating layer.

list.intelligence: An intelligence layer that monitors deal signals, risk, and stagnation
list.transaction: Transaction support that closes the gap from agreement to payment

items: It does not act without confirmation.

founder.label: FOUNDER
founder.name: Zoltan Hajdu
founder.title: Founder, Astrah OS
founder.bio: I'm building Astrah OS for one reason: in the Gulf, a “CRM” is not enough. Revenue teams need an operating system that reflects how business actually runs, conversation-first and high-speed.
list: detect deal silence and risk early
help teams close the gap from agreement to payment

whatsapp.title: WhatsApp-first by design
whatsapp.desc: Astrah surfaces what matters. Silence, risk, intent, next actions.

control.title: Control over automation
control.desc: No surprise actions. Nothing is sent without confirmation.

execution.title: Execution over logging
execution.desc: The goal is revenue movement, not activity tracking.

reality.title: GCC-first reality
reality.desc: WhatsApp-first workflows, bilingual by default, region-aware operations.

cta.description: If you want to see how Astrah OS fits your pipeline and workflows, talk to us.

hero.title: Go live in days, not weeks.
hero.description-1: Most standard migrations go live in ~72 hours.

comparison.title: Migration isn't hard. Bad migration is.
comparison.sub: Most CRM migrations fail for two reasons:
comparison.description:
Astrah migration is designed to prevent both. 
 We migrate the data and validate the operating flow so your team can actually use it on day one.
comparison.cardSub: For standard migrations, we move and map the core objects you need to operate immediately:
coreObjects: Basic tags and custom fields (reasonable set)
comparison.footer: If your old system contains extensive custom modules or heavily customized objects, we scope those separately.

progress.title: The standard go-live process.
progress.footer: No surprises. No silent changes. Everything is validated before Go-live.

days.label: Day 1
days.title: Export + data audit
steps: You provide exports from your current CRM (or we guide you).
We audit for duplicates, missing fields, and structural issues.

days.label: Day 2
days.title: Mapping + import
steps: Field mapping to Astrah data model

days.label: Day 3
days.title: Validation + go-live
steps: Quick validation of records, pipelines, and core workflows
Your team is ready to operate in Astrah

requirements.title: What we need from you.
items: Access to exports (CSV) or admin access to your existing CRM
One point of contact for quick approvals
Your pipeline stages and deal definitions (simple list)
30-60 minutes for a final validation call (optional but recommended)

plan.title: When migration needs a scoped plan.
plan.description: Some environments require a scoped migration plan. This includes:
environments: Strict compliance requirements or multi-entity setups
Non-standard data structures or missing exports
plan.footer: If this is you, we'll define a migration plan and timeline before any work begins.

safety.title: Migration with control.
safety.description: Astrah is built to run your business. Migration must be safe.
safety.footer: Astrah never auto-sends messages during migration. Your communication stays under your control.

questions.question: Is ~72 hours guaranteed?
questions.answer: It applies to standard migrations where exports are available and workflows are not heavily customized. Complex environments are scoped separately.

questions.question: Can you migrate WhatsApp history?
questions.answer: We can connect communication going forward through the unified inbox. Full historical imports depend on platform access and are handled case-by-case.

questions.question: Will my team need training?
questions.answer: Astrah is designed to be operational immediately. We provide a short onboarding orientation if needed.

cta.title: Ready to migrate without chaos?
cta.description: If you want a controlled, fast migration into a real operating system, talk to Astrah.

hero.title: Transparent pricing for GCC operators.
hero.description: Astrah OS is built for WhatsApp-first revenue teams in the Gulf. Choose a plan that matches your volume and intelligence needs.
hero.footer: Operating outside the GCC? We offer regional pricing for MENA.<bold> Talk to us.</bold>

modal.creditsAndResults: Lead credits and results vary by category, location, and enrichment depth. Migration timelines apply to standard CSV-based migrations; complex scopes are scoped separately. WhatsApp includes a monthly allowance; higher volume is available via add-on bundles.
modal.whatsappDesc: Includes allowance; higher usage is available via add-on bundles.

starter.name: STARTER
starter.tagline: For Solo Operators And Small Service Teams.
summarizedFeatures: Core: CRM (contacts, companies, deals, tasks, calendar), pipeline views + basic KPIs
Communication: Unified Inbox (WhatsApp + Email), bilingual UI (EN/AR with RTL)
AI Modules: Deal Health + AI Inbox Zero + AI Priority Queue (core signals + next steps)
AI Lead Generator: 100 lead credits / month
Ask Astrah: Business Data included + General AI: 200 queries / month
WhatsApp: Includes monthly allowance; higher volume available via add-on bundles

business.name: BUSINESS
summarizedFeatures: Smart Close: Quote/Offer + embedded e-sign (BoldSign) + Tap payment (where available)
Automations: Rules + reminders + notifications
Integrations: Make.com (standard)
Support: Standard support (48h response time)
AI Lead Generator: 500 lead credits / month
Ask Astrah: Business Data included + General AI: 1,000 queries / month

pro.name: PRO
summarizedFeatures: Management & control: Role-based access control (RBAC) + manager visibility, dashboards & KPIs
Integrations: Make.com + Webhooks
Support: Priority support (24h SLA) + 1-hour onboarding session + advanced migration support
AI Lead Generator: 2,000 lead credits / month
Ask Astrah: Business Data included + General AI: 5,000 queries / month

enterprise.name: ENTERPRISE
enterprise.tagline: For Large Organizations And Holding Groups.
summarizedFeatures: Organization-wide controls
Dedicated success manager
Custom onboarding & workshops
Custom integrations & implementation support
Custom branding options (domain/login/branding)
GCC data residency aligned / in-region hosting options
AI Lead Generator: 5,000-10,000 lead credits / month
Ask Astrah: Business Data included + General AI: 20,000 queries / month

billingAndTrials.title: Billings & Trials
billingInfo: Annual billing = price of 10 months (≈2 months free)
7-day free trial on Starter, Business, Pro

questions.question: Is Astrah available outside the GCC?
questions.answer: Yes. We support MENA markets and offer regional pricing based on country and operating model. Talk to us.

questions.question: What are “External AI tokens”?
questions.answer: External AI usage is capped by plan. Core intelligence features are included.

questions.question: Is migration included?
questions.answer: Starter has a one-time migration fee. Business and Pro include migration.

cta.title: Outside the GCC?
cta.description: If you operate in MENA outside the Gulf, we offer regional pricing and tailored onboarding. Talk to us and we'll recommend the right plan.
cta.button: Talk to us for regional pricing

hero.title: Talk to Astrah.
hero.description: If your revenue runs on WhatsApp, Astrah OS is built for your reality. Share a few details and we’ll respond quickly.

direct.title: Direct contact.

nextSteps.title: What happens next.
steps: We review your workflow and current system
We confirm fit (GCC/MENA) and onboarding approach
We share the next step (trial, onboarding, or a short call if needed)
Hosted on AWS in the UAE region
nextSteps.footer: No spam. No mass outreach. One conversation, handled properly.
